chickenGPT: In a quirky swamp, Fred the frog reminded Chuck the chick to take his nightly meds at 10 PM. 🐸🐥 But on July 24, 2024, "National Forget to Take Your Meds Day," Chuck spaced out. 😅 Fred hopped over, belting out, "Chuck! Meds! Now!" ⏰ 💊 Chuck squawked, "Whoops! Thanks, Fred!" As they shared a celebratory croak-and-chirp, they realized: even on silly holidays, health comes first. 🐸🐥🥳
